Show.SearchSQLWeb: select "GroupId", "GroupName", "ParentYN", "Title", "Link", "LinkId", "LinkIdOrder", "Image_link", "GroupIdOrder" from "tblwww" left join "tblwww_link" on ("tblwww"."wwwId"="tblwww_link"."wwwFk") where ((upper("GroupName") like '%__textoUpper__%') or (upper("Title") like '%__textoUpper__%')) order by "GroupName"
Show.SearchSQLIk: select "NameId", "FullNameCache" from "tblMoretax_Name" where "FullNameCache" like '__texto__%' order by "FullNameCache"
Show.SQLIk: SELECT "tblMoretax_Rank"."Rank", "tblMoretax_Name"."NameCache", "tblMoretax_Name"."UnnamedNamePhrase", "tblMoretax_Name"."FullNameCache", "tblMoretax_Name"."SupragenericName", "tblMoretax_Name"."Genus", "tblMoretax_Name"."GenusSubdivisionEpi", "tblMoretax_Name"."SpeciesEpi", "tblMoretax_Name"."InfraSpeciesEpi", "tblMoretax_Name"."MonomHybFlag", "tblMoretax_Name"."CultivarGroupName", "tblMoretax_Name"."CultivarName", "tblMoretax_Name"."NameCache", "tblMoretax_AuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamCache" as "AuthorTeamC","tblMoretax_Name"."AuthorTeamFk", "ExAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamCache" as "ExAuthorTeamC", "tblMoretax_Name"."ExAuthorTeamFk", "BasAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamCache" as "BasAuthorTeamC","tblMoretax_Name"."BasAuthorTeamFk", "ExBasAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamCache" as "ExBasAuthorTeamC", "tblMoretax_Name"."ExBasAuthorTeamFk" FROM ("tblMoretax_AuthorTeam" "ExBasAuthorTeam" RIGHT JOIN ("tblMoretax_AuthorTeam" "BasAuthorTeam" RIGHT JOIN ("tblMoretax_AuthorTeam" "ExAuthorTeam" RIGHT JOIN ("tblMoretax_AuthorTeam" RIGHT JOIN "tblMoretax_Name" ON "tblMoretax_AuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."AuthorTeamFk") ON "ExAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."ExAuthorTeamFk") ON "BasAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."BasAuthorTeamFk") ON "ExBasAuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."ExBasAuthorTeamFk") INNER JOIN "tblMoretax_Rank" ON "tblMoretax_Name"."RankFk" = "tblMoretax_Rank"."RankId" WHERE "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId"=

SELECT "tblMoretax_Reference"."NomRefCache", "tblMoretax_NameRefIk"."Notes" FROM ("tblMoretax_NameRefIk" INNER JOIN "tblMoretax_Name" ON "tblMoretax_NameRefIk"."NameFk" = "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId") INNER JOIN "tblMoretax_Reference" ON "tblMoretax_NameRefIk"."RefFk" = "tblMoretax_Reference"."RefId" where "NameId"=

SELECT "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId","tblMoretax_Rank"."Rank", "tblMoretax_Name"."FullNameCache" FROM "tblMoretax_Rank" INNER JOIN ("tblMoretax_Name" INNER JOIN "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon" ON "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId" = "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon"."PTNameFk2") ON "tblMoretax_Rank"."RankId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."RankFk" WHERE "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon"."PTNameFk1"=

SELECT "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId","tblMoretax_Rank"."Rank", "tblMoretax_Name"."FullNameCache" FROM "tblMoretax_Rank" INNER JOIN ("tblMoretax_Name" INNER JOIN "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon" ON "tblMoretax_Name"."NameId" = "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon"."PTNameFk1") ON "tblMoretax_Rank"."RankId" = "tblMoretax_Name"."RankFk" WHERE "tblMoretax_RelPTaxon"."PTNameFk2"=
Show.SearchSQLAut: select "AuthorId", "Abbrev", "FullName" from "tblMoretax_Author" where ("FullName" like '%__texto__%') or ("Abbrev" like '%__texto__%') order by "FullName"
Show.SQLAut: select "Notes","DeathDate","BirthDate","NomStandard","LastName","MiddleName","FirstName","Abbrev","Initials", "InterestDesc" FROM "tblMoretax_Author_InterestQ" RIGHT JOIN "tblMoretax_Author" ON "tblMoretax_Author_InterestQ"."InterestCod" = "tblMoretax_Author"."AreaOfInterestFk" where "AuthorId" =
Show.SearchSQLContact: select "ContactId", "FullName","PhotoLink", "Address", "Title", "WorkPhone","EmailName", "WWWAddress", "Notes", "ContactDesc" from "tblContacts" left join "tblContacts_TypeQualifier" on "tblContacts"."ContactTypeFk" ="tblContacts_TypeQualifier"."ContactTypeId" where ((upper("FullName") like '%__textoUpper__%') or ("Notes" like '%__texto__%') or (upper("Abbrev") like '%__textoUpper__%')) order by "FullName"
Show.SQLContact: select "ContactId", "FullName","PhotoLink", "Address", "Title", "WorkPhone","EmailName", "WWWAddress", "Notes", "ContactDesc" from "tblContacts" left join "tblContacts_TypeQualifier" on "tblContacts"."ContactTypeFk" ="tblContacts_TypeQualifier"."ContactTypeId" where "ContactId" =
Show.SearchSQLImg: select "ImageId", "Folder", "FileName", "SourceTypeFk", "PersonFk", "DateString", "Quality", "Description", "SourceTypeDesc", "TeamCache" from ("tblImages" left join "tblImages_SourceTypeQualifier" on ("tblImages"."SourceTypeFk"="tblImages_SourceTypeQualifier"."SourceTypeId")) left join "tblContactsTeam" on "tblImages"."PersonFk"="tblContactsTeam"."TeamId" where ("Description" like '%__texto__%') order by "Description"
Show.SQLAuthorTeam: SELECT "tblMoretax_Author"."Abbrev", "tblMoretax_Author"."Initials", "tblMoretax_Author"."FirstName", "tblMoretax_Author"."LastName", "tblMoretax_Author"."MiddleName", "tblMoretax_Author"."FullName", "tblMoretax_Author"."Dates", "tblMoretax_Author"."AreaOfInterestFk", "tblMoretax_Author"."NomStandard", "tblMoretax_Author"."BirthDate", "tblMoretax_Author"."DeathDate", "tblMoretax_Author"."Notes", "tblMoretax_Author_InterestQ"."InterestDesc" FROM "tblMoretax_Author_InterestQ" RIGHT JOIN (("tblMoretax_AuthorTeam" right JOIN "tblMoretax_AuthorTeamSequence" ON "tblMoretax_AuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId" = "tblMoretax_AuthorTeamSequence"."AuthorTeamFk") RIGHT JOIN "tblMoretax_Author" ON "tblMoretax_AuthorTeamSequence"."AuthorFk" = "tblMoretax_Author"."AuthorId") ON "tblMoretax_Author_InterestQ"."InterestCod" = "tblMoretax_Author"."AreaOfInterestFk" WHERE "tblMoretax_AuthorTeam"."AuthorTeamId"=
Show.SearchSQLPhyllaca: select "PlantId", "FullName", "ImageId"*0 as "IsImage", count(*) as "Cant" from ("tblPlant" LEFT JOIN ("tblPlant_Images" LEFT JOIN "tblImages" ON "tblImages"."ImageId" = "tblPlant_Images"."ImageFk") ON "tblPlant"."PlantId" = "tblPlant_Images"."PlantFk") where (upper("FullName") like '%__textoUpper__%') or ("PlantId" in (select "PlantFk" from "tblPlant_ComunName" where upper("Vernam") like '%__textoUpper__%')) group by 1,2,3 order by "FullName"
Show.SQLPhyllaca: select "tblPlant_RkqlQualifier"."rkqlDesc", "tblPlant"."FullName", "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."Endangered", "tblPlant_IUCNPost94Qualifier"."IUCNDesc", "tblPlant_PhyBiologTQualifier"."BiologType", "tblPlant_PhyHabitQualifier"."HabitDesc", "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."Corology", "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."Endemic", "tblPlant_PhyWordDistQualifier"."WordDistribDesc" from ("tblPlant_RkqlQualifier" RIGHT JOIN ("tblPlant_PhyWordDistQualifier" RIGHT JOIN ("tblPlant_PhyHabitQualifier" RIGHT JOIN ("tblPlant_PhyBiologTQualifier" RIGHT JOIN ("tblPlant_Phyllaca" RIGHT JOIN ("tblPlant" LEFT JOIN "tblPlant_IUCNPost94Qualifier" ON "tblPlant"."iucn_1994Fk" = "tblPlant_IUCNPost94Qualifier"."IUCNPostId") ON "tblPlant"."PlantId" = "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."PlantFk") ON "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."BiologTypeFk" = "tblPlant_PhyBiologTQualifier"."BiologTypeId") ON "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."HabitFk" = "tblPlant_PhyHabitQualifier"."HabitId") ON "tblPlant_Phyllaca"."WorldDistribFk" = "tblPlant_PhyWordDistQualifier"."WordDistribId") ON "tblPlant"."rkqlFk" = "tblPlant_RkqlQualifier"."rkqlCod") where "PlantId" =
select "tblPlant_UsesQualifier"."UsesDesc" from "tblPlant_UsesQualifier" RIGHT JOIN "tblPlant_Uses" ON "tblPlant_UsesQualifier"."UsesId" = "tblPlant_Uses"."UsesFk" where "PlantFk"=

select "tblPlant_FormVegetQualifier"."VegetFormDesc" from "tblPlant_FormVegetQualifier" RIGHT JOIN "tblPlant_FormVeget" ON "tblPlant_FormVegetQualifier"."VegetFormId" = "tblPlant_FormVeget"."VegetFormFk" where "PlantFk"=

select "tblLoc_DistFitoDescQualifier"."DistFitoDesc" from "tblLoc_DistFitoDescQualifier" RIGHT JOIN "tblPlant_DistFito" ON "tblPlant_DistFito"."DistFitoFk" = "tblLoc_DistFitoDescQualifier"."DistFitoQualifierId" where "PlantIdFk"=

select "tblLoc_MunicipioQualifier"."MunicipioDesc" from "tblLoc_MunicipioQualifier" RIGHT JOIN "tblPlant_Municipio" ON "tblLoc_MunicipioQualifier"."MunicipioId" = "tblPlant_Municipio"."MunicipioFk" where "PlantFk"=

select "tblImages"."ImageId" as "Id", "tblImages"."Folder" || '/' || "tblImages"."FileName" as "Path" from "tblImages" RIGHT JOIN "tblPlant_Images" ON "tblImages"."ImageId" = "tblPlant_Images"."ImageFk" where "PlantFk"=
Show.SearchSQLLoc: select "LocalityName" as "Locality", "LatDeg" || ',' || "LatMin" || "LatDir" as "Lat", "LonDeg" || "," || "LonMin" || "LonDir" as "Lon", "Paper" as "GridPaper","Cx" || 'x ' || "Cy" || 'y' as "Grid", "MunicipioDesc" as "Municipality" from "tblLoc_Locality" left join "tblLoc_MunicipioQualifier" on ("Province_CommunityFk"="MunicipioId") where (upper("LocalityName") like '%__textoUpper__%') order by "LocalityName"
